revised_title: The Lethality and Effects of Sepedon Hemachates Venom on Various Animals
tldr: This study investigates the lethality and effects of Sepedon hemachates venom on various animals, including frogs, rabbits, rats, cats, and pigeons. The minimum-lethal doses for each animal are determined, and the symptoms and effects of the venom on the cerebrospinal nervous system, skeletal muscle, circulation, respiration, and temperature are discussed.
